Generation IV.Diamond: Known as "The Being of Emotion." It taught humans the nobility of sorrow, pain, and joy.
Generation IV.Pearl: It sleeps at the bottom of a lake. Its spirit is said to leave its body to fly on the lake's surface.
Generation IV.Platinum: When Mesprit flew, people learned the joy and sadness of living. It was the birth of emotions.
